tool_description:
I’m on telegram chat me if there a problem/request
https://t.me/franc0jr

Peta (maps) Harga Pangan Indonesia sama seperti di https://badanpangan.go.id/
other features: 
  - Summary Hari ini
  - Peta (alert kenaikan +10%, perbandingan harga kemarin, perbandingan harga minggu lalu)
  - Table List Harga Komoditas (makanan Pokok)
name: Peta Harga Pangan Indonesia
title: Peta Harga Pangan Indonesia

api_list.name: Data Table Harga Komoditas Hari ini
api_list.description:
Data table harga komoditas hari ini by Kab/Kota
beserta harga HET (Harga Eceran Tertinggi)

api_list.name: Harga Komoditas view Map GEOJSON
api_list.description: GEOJSON dengan Harga Pangan Pokok Per Komoditas

api_list.name: List Commodity (Komoditas)
api_list.description: List Komoditas Makanan Pokok (pangan pokok indonesia)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/data/food-prices/commodities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/data/food-prices/commodities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trend Harga Komoditas Per hari
api_list.description:
Trend harga komoditas 7 hari kebelakang
beserta harga HET (Harga Eceran Tertinggi)

api_list.name: List Districts (Kab/Kota)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/area/districts/31"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://peta-harga-pangan-indonesia.p.rapidapi.com/area/districts/{provinsiid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

api_list.name: List Provinsi (Provinces)
